com.hazelcast.cache.impl

Class CachePartitionSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.cache.impl.CachePartitionSegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstructorFunction<String,ICacheRecordStore>

    public class CachePartitionSegment
extends Object
implements ConstructorFunction<String,ICacheRecordStore>

    Responsible for all cache data of a partition. Creates and looks up CacheRecordStores by name.

    A CacheService manages all CachePartitionSegments.
